urls.title: Environment Agency launches World Ocean Day resources for schools
urls.description: Schools across England will mark World Ocean Day (WOD) next month (Tuesday 8 June) by exploring the journey of plastic with the Environment Agency.

tweets.text: Our #PreventingPlasticPollution partner @EnvAgency has created an interactive schools resource to help pupils explore the journey of plastic from source üíß to sea üå´Ô∏èculminating in a Q&A with them & @WWF on #WorldOceanDay in June.  More at https://t.co/24UwywoJ4H @Plastics_EU https://t.co/dymwvs0fu7

tweets.text: The next stage in repairing two groynes (13 & 14) at Teignmouth is underway. Access to the lighthouse, the prom and nearby steps to the beach will be restricted until 1 June whilst @EnvAgency contractors undertake the work at low tides. Temporary safety fencing will be in place. https://t.co/DSKaSr6OTc
